title: Reinfor Concrete Members
description: Behavior and design of RC members; ductility and inelastic response; deep beams; corbel and torsion design; column biaxial bending; shearwalls; effects of creep and shrinkage.

prerequisites: CEE 4520 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
